title: Swiss crypto bigwig surrenders to NYPD for questioning in sick SoHo torture case: sources
description: The founder of a Swiss crypto currently fund was sought for questioning in the horrific kidnapping and torture of a wealthy Italian bitcoin dealer in SoHo.

title: Trump’s media company says it’s buying $2.5 billion in Bitcoin
description: President Donald Trump’s media company could soon own $2.5 billion in Bitcoin. On Tuesday, Trump Media announced that it’s working with “approximately 50 institutional investors” to sell and issue $1.5 billion in stock and $1 billion in convertible notes. The company, which operates Truth Social among other services, will be used to establish a large holding of Bitcoin.Trump Media says Crypto.com and the crypto banking platform Anchorage Digital will provide custody services for the company’s Bitcoin treasury.“We view Bitcoin as an apex instrument of financial freedom...

title: Second crypto investor arrested in bitcoin kidnapping and torture case
description: Police say William Duplessie and John Woeltz tortured a man for his crypto fortune in a luxury Manhattan townhouse over three weeks.

title: Alleged Crypto Torture Victim Seen Barefoot, Begging Cop for Help After Escape
description: The moment a Bitcoin trader finally escaped his alleged crypto hellscape was caught on surveillance -- and the footage is just as dramatic as it sounds. In video obtained by NBC New York, Michael Valentino Teofrasto Carturan can be seen in a casual…

title: Why it's now time to jump on the Bitcoin bandwagon: As crypto booms, our world-leading experts reveal exactly how you can rake in the cash... and the precautions you MUST take
description: Bitcoin is hitting new all-time highs once again and is up by close to 50 pc in the last year alone.
